item.description:
Hi all,
Our August meet-up will be August 4, 2012 at 2:00pm
Alexandra Morgan's Animal School
80 Cutler St.
Warren, RI 02885
401-434-3687
Admission is $5

**For those of you attending the meet-ups, please don't forget to bring your pug's medical paperwork including a stool sample result testing negative for Coccidia AND Giardia.**
If you need any info. on Pug training, boarding or daycare, Sandra or Alexandra will be happy to answer any questions you have.

group.who: The East Bay Pug Meet-up Group
group.name: The East Bay Pug Meetup Group
